snippet.title: Painted in Blood - Six One Indie Showcase Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the brutal trailer for Painted in Blood, an upcoming action-adventure FPS game. The trailer showcases a host of nightmarish creatures you'll encounter and must destroy. Trapped in the haunting realm of an artist's twisted nightmare, engage in intense combats with grotesque enemies and monsters, experience unpredictable horror events that unfold dynamically, seamlessly blends classic retro FPS elements with modern elements. Painted in Blood will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
